Name: aar-sheikhmahmoudab
Author: Sheikh Mahmoud Abdel Qader Hamz And Group Of Scholars

Translations.Text: Nabiyow matablannaa korosuk Yallih aayootal sinam (Qhuraan kinnuk) giddiya mara, usun teetil yaamineenimik mannal daggawsimaanaah
Qhuraan kitab kee Ni-farmoytit edde rubnem dirabboyse marii korosuk, toysa ama dirabboysiyyih ellecabo sarrah aaxige-lon
Silsilootat ken gaboobi ken fillittet axawah anuk ibitte keenik edde debran waqdi, Malayka ken edde hirriigissah
Niqna kak caddok taturte leel ken hirriigisan, tohuk lakal giráh addal girá keenit ursan
Tohih lakal ken sahitak Yallat agleh haak aqbaduk sugten Yallitte annih teetiiy keenik iyyan
Yallak kalah aqbaduk sugten Yallitte sin maay catta asaaku? nek qelliteenih ken manabla hinnay inkinnah duma tu-yaqbude marah masuginnino iyyan.Yalli koros tama mara kah makkoysennaah makkoysah
Ama digaalá sin kah geytem baaxô bagul cakki maliinoh abak sugten wallitiyyaa kee batrah Yallih naqoosat abak sugten caddok taturih sabbata
Jahannam giráh afoofik cula tet addal waarak, tokkel manxu umaah kaxxamariino-leelah orbeyná

Toysa nabiyow isbir diggah Yallih xagni nummak, tokkel digaaláy ken kah xagnisnek tu-koo aybullee kee hinnay koo warrayse (raba kinnuk) akkenno ken digaallak naharat, toysa nee fan gacsime-lon qhiyaamah ayró

Nummah Yalli xiibitak iyyah; nabiyow kok naharat farmoytit rubneh, keenik xaagu kol kak maaqnem linooh, keenik xaagu kol kak maaqe waynem linoh, kaadu faxe farmoytah makkinna hebeltoh astá baaham Yallih idinih akke waytek, tokkel Yallih amri yamaate waqdi koros digaaláh meklá cakkıil tekke farmoytit kee ken dirabboyse marih fanat, tokkel baatilleelá finqitteh
